original_text: King David was now a very old man. He could not stay warm, even when people put blankets over him. Kings Introduction Kings 2
korean_text: 다윗 왕이 나이가 많아 늙으니 이불을 덮어도 따뜻하지 아니한지라

sentences.original_text: King David was now a very old man
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕은 이제 매우 늙은 사람이었습니다

sentences.original_text: even when people put blankets over him
